summary: Diff implements core chat reply metadata (replyToId), long-press reply targeting, left/right message alignment, and purple reply indicator styling. However, it also introduces broad global theme/color changes in frontend/src/index.css that go beyond chat-only styling and may affect unrelated app sections.

hallucinated_features.description: Global app-wide color/theme palette changes (OKLCH variables, warm green accent, sidebar colors, typography tweaks) that are not limited to the chat area.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 asks for a cohesive chat visual theme and explicitly says not to change unrelated app sections; modifying global CSS variables and base element styles affects the entire app, not just chat.

hallucinated_features.description: New generic global utility/style additions not explicitly requested (e.g., global code styling and heading line-height adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the chat bubble/reply requirements and applies across the app, risking changes to unrelated sections.
